title: Modern Weapons Sound System - ALL-IN-ONE
description: Modern Weapons Sound System ALL-IN-ONE is the result of the joint work of our experienced programmers and sound designers. Over 780 weapon sounds of firing for rifles, machine guns, pistols, sniper rifles and launchers. Use it and make your War real!
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE IT | HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER | HOW TO USE IT FOR INTERIOR AREAS | WEAPONS LIST | AUDIO PREVIEW |

Enable "Modern_Weapons_AIO" plugin, restart UE and try our "DemoLevel" in "Modern_Weapons_AIO Content".


Our sound system is not just the sounds. This is the result of the joint work of our experienced programmers and sound designers who have created many successful projects. It will be useful for any AAA modern shooter.


  • Fully prepared sound shooting system for your game project
  • Different sounds for different firing modes
  • Different sound attenuations
  • Different sounds from different distance for each weapon
  • Different Post-FX editing for the sounds (EQ, Spreader, Reverb, Delay and so on)
  • Сompetent combination of looped sounds of shooting, the beginning of shooting and an echo after shooting
  • Looped sounds are played each time from different time points within the file. So that each of your firing is unique
  • Suppressed and unsuppressed sounds
  • Ammunition Casings sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication


With Modern Weapons Sound System All-In-One, you'll have access to a vast library of 782 firing weapon sounds, including both suppressed and unsuppressed variants for 33 modern guns. From pistols to rifles, from shotguns to machine guns and missile systems we've got you covered. Please check our Weapon List for this library. In addition to the extensive collection of firing weapon sounds, All-In-One also includes over 530 Ammunition Casings Sounds as a bonus. 12 different surfaces include concrete, metal, gravel, and more, providing a diverse range of options to choose from. Additionally, it includes different shell calibers, including 9mm, 5.56 - 7.62mm, shotgun and sniper. When creating the sounds, we used real recordings. Therefore, the nature and rate of fire of the weapon is absolutely identical to how it sounds in real life.


Our collection is perfect for sound designers and audio engineers looking to add depth and realism to their projects. Whether you're working on a film, a video game, or a music track, Modern Weapons Sound System All-In-One will help you take your project to the next level. The product is also a great resource for gun enthusiasts looking to expand their knowledge and experience. We believe that Weapons Sounds All-In-One is the most comprehensive and realistic collection of firing weapon sounds available on the market today. We've put in countless hours of work to ensure that each sound is of the highest quality and accuracy. 


The Unreal Engine Code Plugin based on C++ and Blueprints. It contains all the necessary material to control the overall sound of your battle scene not only for single-player, but also for multiplayer. Perfect sound quality, optimal length and format. With our sound system you can easily adjust or update the sounds, or create your own weapon. Use it and make your War real ⚡


If you're looking for a more affordable option and don't need as many sounds, we offer a selection of separate libraries that may better suit your needs:

| WEAPONS PART I | WEAPONS PART II | WEAPONS PART III |

| SUPPRESSED WEAPONS PART I | SUPPRESSED WEAPONS PART II | SUPPRESSED WEAPONS PART III |
technicalDetails:
Code Module: Modern_Weapons_AIO (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 74

Number of C++ Classes: 5

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


HOW TO USE IT :

  • Enable plugin "Modern_Weapons_AIO" from "SoundFX.Studio" category - "Edit > Plugins". Restart UE
  • Find and load "DemoLevel" in "Modern_Weapons_AIO Content"
  • Fire!!!


HOW TO USE IT WITH A NEW UE4 PROJECT: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT FOR INTERIOR AREAS: VIDEO


You can find all plugin content in Content Browser. Make sure the checkboxes Bottom right of the "Content Browser > View Options > Show Engine Content" and "Content Browser > View Options > Show Plugin Content" are checked.


Support: info@soundfx.studio

Discord: https://discord.gg/HzVuvSuCHr
